entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
